thread.title: ESPN Completely Disses The Lions By Assuming The Seahawks Will Advance In Playoffs Before Game Is Played
thread.title_full: ESPN Completely Disses The Lions By Assuming The Seahawks Will Advance In Playoffs Before Game Is Played

author: Jorge Alonso
title: ESPN Completely Disses The Lions By Assuming The Seahawks Will Advance In Playoffs Before Game Is Played
text:
The Lions have had a pretty good season and have made the playoffs but they still can’t get any respect. 
During today’s playoff coverage, ESPN already has the Seahawks advancing and playing the Falcons next week. 
Hey @ESPNNFL @espn , I wasn't aware the Seahawks already won.. keep sleeping on us. @lions #DetroitvsEverybody #OnePride pic.twitter.com/FNVHDgww61 
— The Lions Man (@TheLionsMan) January 7, 2017 

C’mon ESPN you can’t be disrespecting the Lions like that.
